item.title: RPI3 Disable LEDs
item.description: To disable the LEDs on a Raspberry Pi 3, add the following to the /boot/config.txt file: dtparam=act_led_trigger=none dtparam=act_led_activelow=off dtparam=pwr_led_trigger=none dtparam=pwr_led_activelow=off More information: Raspberry Pi Guide - 5.2 Control LEDs
